Description:
Irresistibly charming in quiet complex.
Beyond the stylish brick-veneer facade, this superb home has been designed for comfortable and effortless living. Boasting a light filled and spacious layout, this delightful two-bedroom residence is set off the road for complete peace and privacy and is located within close proximity to public transport, shops, parks and schools.
Upon entering, the neutral colour scheme suitably contrasts with the eye-catching tone of the carpet to offer a pleasant greeting. The home boasts a comfortable lounge which offers an arresting connection to the leafy surrounds, in addition to a spacious dining area which is serviced by a fully-equipped kitchen that brings together all the essentials for the home chef, featuring; electric oven, gas stove, dishwasher, walk-in pantry, servery and generous cupboard space. Furthermore, cream cabinetry and tiled backsplash create an eye-catching finish.
Positioned off a quiet hall, the carefully considered floorplan places the sizable bedrooms away from the living areas, which have been appreciably fitted with built-in robes. The tiled main bathroom is conveniently accessible and features a separate bath, shower and adjoining toilet.
The private and quiet complex consists of only three residences while other benefits list as; full-sized tiled laundry, gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, dual roller blinds, linen cupboard and remote double garage with access to the rear secure courtyard. The single-level floorplan is another immeasurable bonus, making everyday living a breeze.
This property is located only a brief walk from The Mall shopping strip, Cheong Park with barbeque area and playground, Tarralla Creek, bus stop, as well as being just a short drive from Tinternvale Primary School, Ainslie Parklands Primary School, Tintern Grammar, Arndale Civic Shopping Centre, Croydon Railway Station, EastLink freeway and Croydon Memorial Pool.
This attractive and comfortable home will entice the retiree, investor, first-home buyer, executive couple or those looking to downsize. If you're searching for a home with special appeal, we've found it for you.
